# 𓍈 𓍇 𓍉

S-T-P / S-P-T

𓋴 𓏏 𓊪 𓅱 𓍉 𓏛 𓏥 ≈ 𓍉 𓊪 𓏏 𓄹 𓏥

𓍉 chop choice step top stuff 𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓍉 𓏛 | leap up | step 𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓍉 𓏛 | cut up (animal) | stab? chop 𓋴 𓏏 𓊪 𓍉 𓎂 | protect, do escort duty | ¬stop Schutz <> 𓋴 𓍿 𓎂 escort 𓊃 𓍉 𓏏 𓊪 𓄘 𓄘 𓄘

𓋴 𓏏 𓊪 𓅱 𓍉 𓏛 𓏥 | the choicest | 𒄑 top stuff 𓋴 𓏏 𓊪 𓅱 𓍉 𓏛 𓏥 | the choicest | steepest? styper > super ? 𓋴 𓏏 𓊪 𓅱 𓍉 𓏛 𓏥 | the choicest | <> kostbar ( Giš 𓋴 𓆭 𒄑 cis- кошто́вний koštóvnyj кошт cost 𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓏏 𓍉 𓄗 𓄯 𓏥 | choice things | <> Stoff stuff ? 𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓏏 𓍉 𓄗 𓄯 𓏥 | choice things | скъпоце́нен skǎpocénen 𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓏏 𓍉 𓄗 𓄯 𓏥 | choice things | ძვირფასი ʒvirpasi 𓍉 𓊪 𓏏 𓄹 𓏥 | choice things | separate specialities 𓋴 𓃀 𓈎 𓂾 | (adj.) splendid, precious | special spicy 𓋴 𓊪 𓂧 𓏏 𓇮 spitzen ware

N form: 𒀫 𒋻 amar-kud "castrated "

𓈖 𓍉 𓃢 ⇔ 𓈖 𓈙 𓅓 𓌪 cut, sharpen ?
𓈖 𓍉 𓃢 enxó (adze) un ascia
𓈖 𓍉 𓃢 un Adze ⇔ מַעֲצָד ma'atad 𓍊𓌹𓌸𓌻? meissel? herminette? ⇔ harm “weasel” (h)ermine
